# Introduction

Plotly is used in :

 * [Plotly R library](https://plot.ly/r/)
 * [Plotly python library](https://plot.ly/products/dash/)
 * [Dash interactive python-based analysis websites](https://plot.ly/products/dash/),
 similar to the Shiny framework for R
